id: Marvel Actors Are Reacting To Stan Lee's Death, And It Will Break Your Heart
paragraph:
Excelsior, always Excelsior.
        THANK YOU, @TheRealStanLee. You gave us characters that continue to stand the test of time and evolve with our consciousness. You taught us that there are no limits to our future as long as we have access to our imagination. Rest in power! #EXCELSIOR #StanLee #rip https://t.co/hnSmnHIDlnDamn... RIP Stan. Thanks for everything.Stan Lee. A gentleman and a genius. It was an honor to be a small part of his universe. Rest In Peace.Not enough kind words to post about my dear friend @TheRealStanLee 
My life wouldn’t be the same without his incredible talent as a creator, storyteller and friend 👍🏽

Rest In Peace Stan. You’ll be missed. 
.
#legend #hulk #stanlee #rip https://t.co/9XU45GHCnqBuzzFeed HomeSitemap© 2018 BuzzFeed, Inc.
